捶.definition: to beat (with a stick or one's fist); to thump; to pound

捶子.definition: drum stick; bass drum mallet; CL:把[ba3]

捶打.definition: to beat; to pound; to thump

捶背.definition: to massage sb's back by pounding it lightly with one's fists

捶胸頓足.definition: (idiom) to beat one's chest and stamp one's feet (in sorrow, anguish etc)
